content:
XmlAtomicValue Class

In this Article

Represents the typed value of a validated XML element or attribute. The XmlAtomicValue class cannot be inherited.

Syntax

Declaration

public sealed class XmlAtomicValue : System.Xml.XPath.XPathItem, ICloneable

Inheritance Hierarchy

  • Object
  • System.Xml.XPath.XPathItem
  • XmlAtomicValue

Inherited Members

Equals(Object)
,
Equals(Object,Object)
,
GetHashCode()
,
GetType()
,
MemberwiseClone()
,
ReferenceEquals(Object,Object)
,
ValueAs(Type)

Properties summary

IsNode

Gets a value indicating whether the validated XML element or attribute is an XPath node or an atomic value.
TypedValue

Gets the current validated XML element or attribute as a boxed object of the most appropriate Microsoft .NET Framework type according to its schema type.
Value

Gets the string value of the validated XML element or attribute.
ValueAsBoolean

Gets the validated XML element or attribute's value as a Boolean.
ValueAsDateTime

Gets the validated XML element or attribute's value as a DateTime.
ValueAsDouble

Gets the validated XML element or attribute's value as a Double.
ValueAsInt

Gets the validated XML element or attribute's value as an Int32.
ValueAsLong

Gets the validated XML element or attribute's value as an Int64.
ValueType

Gets the Microsoft .NET Framework type of the validated XML element or attribute.
XmlType

Gets the XmlSchemaType for the validated XML element or attribute.

Methods summary

Clone()

Returns a copy of this XmlAtomicValue object.
ToString()

Gets the string value of the validated XML element or attribute.
ValueAs(Type,IXmlNamespaceResolver)

Returns the validated XML element or attribute's value as the type specified using the IXmlNamespaceResolver object specified to resolve namespace prefixes.

Explicit Interface Implementations summary

ICloneable.Clone()

For a description of this member, see stem.Xml.Schema.XmlAtomicValue.Clone*.

Properties

  • IsNode

    Gets a value indicating whether the validated XML element or attribute is an XPath node or an atomic value.

    public override bool IsNode { get; }

    Property Value

    • Boolean

      true if the validated XML element or attribute is an XPath node; false if the validated XML element or attribute is an atomic value.

    Remarks

    The IsNode property always returns false.

  • TypedValue

    Gets the current validated XML element or attribute as a boxed object of the most appropriate Microsoft .NET Framework type according to its schema type.

    public override object TypedValue { get; }

    Property Value

    • Object

      The current validated XML element or attribute as a boxed object of the most appropriate .NET Framework type.

    Remarks

    If the value of the item is not valid according to its specified schema type, the value of the TypedValue property is equivalent to the value of the Value property.

    For more information about type support in the System.Xml namespace, see Type Support in the System.Xml Classes.

  • Value

    Gets the string value of the validated XML element or attribute.

    public override string Value { get; }

    Property Value

    • String

      The string value of the validated XML element or attribute.

  • ValueAsBoolean

    Gets the validated XML element or attribute's value as a Boolean.

    public override bool ValueAsBoolean { get; }

    Property Value

    • Boolean

      The validated XML element or attribute's value as a Boolean.

    Exceptions

    • FormatException

      The validated XML element or attribute's value is not in the correct format for the Boolean type.

    • InvalidCastException

      The attempted cast to Boolean is not valid.

    Remarks

    The ValueAsBoolean property attempts to convert the value of the validated XML element or attribute to the Microsoft .NET Framework Boolean type according to the XPath 2.0 rules for casting the item's type.

    For more information about type support in the System.Xml namespace, see Type Support in the System.Xml Classes.

  • ValueAsDateTime

    Gets the validated XML element or attribute's value as a DateTime.

    public override DateTime ValueAsDateTime { get; }

    Property Value

    • DateTime

      The validated XML element or attribute's value as a DateTime.

    Exceptions

    • FormatException

      The validated XML element or attribute's value is not in the correct format for the DateTime type.

    • InvalidCastException

      The attempted cast to DateTime is not valid.

    Remarks

    The ValueAsDateTime property attempts to convert the value of the validated XML element or attribute to the Microsoft .NET Framework DateTime type according to the XPath 2.0 rules for casting the item's type.

    For more information about type support in the System.Xml namespace, see Type Support in the System.Xml Classes.

  • ValueAsDouble

    Gets the validated XML element or attribute's value as a Double.

    public override double ValueAsDouble { get; }

    Property Value

    • Double

      The validated XML element or attribute's value as a Double.

    Exceptions

    • FormatException

      The validated XML element or attribute's value is not in the correct format for the Double type.

    • InvalidCastException

      The attempted cast to Double is not valid.

    • OverflowException

      The attempted cast resulted in an overflow.

    Remarks

    The ValueAsDouble property attempts to convert the value of the validated XML element or attribute to the Microsoft .NET Framework Double type according to the XPath 2.0 rules for casting the item's type.

    For more information about type support in the System.Xml namespace, see Type Support in the System.Xml Classes.

  • ValueAsInt

    Gets the validated XML element or attribute's value as an Int32.

    public override int ValueAsInt { get; }

    Property Value

    • Int32

      The validated XML element or attribute's value as an Int32.

    Exceptions

    • FormatException

      The validated XML element or attribute's value is not in the correct format for the Int32 type.

    • InvalidCastException

      The attempted cast to Int32 is not valid.

    • OverflowException

      The attempted cast resulted in an overflow.

    Remarks

    The ValueAsInt property attempts to convert the value of the validated XML element or attribute to the Microsoft .NET Framework Int32 type according to the XPath 2.0 rules for casting the item's type.

    For more information about type support in the System.Xml namespace, see Type Support in the System.Xml Classes.

  • ValueAsLong

    Gets the validated XML element or attribute's value as an Int64.

    public override long ValueAsLong { get; }

    Property Value

    • Int64

      The validated XML element or attribute's value as an Int64.

    Exceptions

    • FormatException

      The validated XML element or attribute's value is not in the correct format for the Int64 type.

    • InvalidCastException

      The attempted cast to Int64 is not valid.

    • OverflowException

      The attempted cast resulted in an overflow.

    Remarks

    The ValueAsLong property attempts to convert the value of the validated XML element or attribute to the Microsoft .NET Framework Int64 type according to the XPath 2.0 rules for casting the item's type.

    For more information about type support in the System.Xml namespace, see Type Support in the System.Xml Classes.

  • ValueType

    Gets the Microsoft .NET Framework type of the validated XML element or attribute.

    public override Type ValueType { get; }

    Property Value

    • Type

      The .NET Framework type of the validated XML element or attribute. The default value is String.

    Remarks

    The ValueType property gets the .NET Framework type of the typed value of the validated XML element or attribute.

    For example, an element of type xs:int would have a ValueType of Int32 by default. However, the ValueType could be any one of the valid types that can be mapped to xs:int, such as Int16 or Double.

    For more information about type support in the System.Xml namespace, see Type Support in the System.Xml Classes.

  • XmlType

    Gets the XmlSchemaType for the validated XML element or attribute.

    public override System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaType XmlType { get; }

    Property Value

    • XmlSchemaType

      The XmlSchemaType for the validated XML element or attribute.

    Remarks

    The XmlType property gets the XmlSchemaType for the validated XML element or attribute. For example, the XmlSchemaSimpleType or XmlSchemaComplexType.

Methods

  • Clone()

    Returns a copy of this XmlAtomicValue object.

    public System.Xml.Schema.XmlAtomicValue Clone ();

    Returns

    • XmlAtomicValue

      An XmlAtomicValue object copy of this XmlAtomicValue object.

  • ToString()

    Gets the string value of the validated XML element or attribute.

    public override string ToString ();

    Returns

    • String

      The string value of the validated XML element or attribute.

  • ValueAs(Type,IXmlNamespaceResolver)

    Returns the validated XML element or attribute's value as the type specified using the IXmlNamespaceResolver object specified to resolve namespace prefixes.

    public override object ValueAs (Type type, System.Xml.IXmlNamespaceResolver nsResolver);

    Parameters

    • type
      Type

      The type to return the validated XML element or attribute's value as.

    • nsResolver
      IXmlNamespaceResolver

      The IXmlNamespaceResolver object used to resolve namespace prefixes.

    Returns

    • Object

      The value of the validated XML element or attribute as the type requested.

    Exceptions

    • FormatException

      The validated XML element or attribute's value is not in the correct format for the target type.

    • InvalidCastException

      The attempted cast is not valid.

    • OverflowException

      The attempted cast resulted in an overflow.

    Remarks

    The ValueAs method attempts to convert the value of the validated XML element or attribute to the Microsoft .NET Framework type specified.

    The IXmlNamespaceResolver object is used to resolve namespace prefixes related to type conversions. For example, when converting an xs:QName to an xs:string.

    For more information about type support in the System.Xml namespace, see Type Support in the System.Xml Classes.

Explicit Interface Implementations

  • ICloneable.Clone()

    For a description of this member, see stem.Xml.Schema.XmlAtomicValue.Clone*.

    object ICloneable.Clone ();

    Returns

    • Object

      Returns a copy of this XmlAtomicValue object.

    Remarks

    This member is an explicit interface member implementation. It can be used only when the XmlAtomicValue instance is cast to an ICloneable interface.
